definition: قنط qaniṭa a (qanaṭ), qanaṭa u i (قنوط qunūṭ) and qanuṭa u (قناطة qanāṭa) to despair, despond, become disheartened, be without hope, lose all courage II to drive to despair, dishearten, discourage (ه s.o.) IV do. قنط qanaṯ and قنوط qunūṭ despair, despondency, desperateness, hopelessness قنط qaniṭ and قنوط qanūṭ despairing, desperate, disheartened, discouraged
